featured.text: I’m going to be the fourth piglet of its next litter.
Future plans include a cooperative effort among many nations to stop littering in space and to clean up the trash already there.
Soon after their 36 , the guru died and the sow did have a litter of four little pigs.

definition.zh_def: 垃圾，廢棄物，尤其是隨意丟棄的物品。
definition.en_def: Waste material, especially trash that is carelessly discarded.
definition.example: Please don't litter in the park.
